short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get and share highlights from YouTube and Twitch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn any YouTube or Twitch video into TikToks, Instagram Reels and YouTube Shorts automatically. With Framedrop’s extension you will be one click away from getting the best moments from any video you are watching.

Framedrop reduces the time it takes to repurpose content by 90% 🤯

Features:
- 🧠 AI Detection: Automatically find highlights in all kinds of content - talking content, funny moments, gaming plays, etc
- 🏷️ Clip Labeling: Skip the preview, know what your clips are all about with automatic labeling
- 🧩 Layout Templates: Make your content fit any platform with helpful layout templates
- ✂️ Trim Your Clips: Find the starting and ending timings with a powerful trimming tool
- 🖇️ Compilations: Select multiple clips and create a compilation
- 🌐 AI Generated Subtitles: Expand your content’s reach with perfectly timed AI generated subtitles - support to more than 25 languages
- 🪄 Transcribed Clips: Freely edit subtitles by simply editing your clips’ scripts
- 📲 Direct Export: Get your content on all social media platforms with a simple QR code scan - TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Twitter and more
Use Cases:
- 🎙️ Podcasts: More than 5,000 podcasts use Framedrop to create short-form videos from their episodes
- 🎥 Live Streaming: Join the 1,000+ streamers that are using Framedrop to automatically clip their live streams’ VODs
- 📺 Content Consumption: No time to watch a whole 4-hour podcast? Skip the filler and go straight for the best moments
- 📈 Sales & Marketing: Running a content-dense campaign? Managing multiple Creators? Make your life easier and 10x your workflow

Supported Games:
- Apex Legends
- Call of Duty: Warzone (1 to 3)
- Fortnite
- League of Legends
- Rocket League
- Valorant

Supported Platforms:
- YouTube
- Twitch
- Manual Import/Upload

No download required.

Framedrop is a faster, leaner and more convenient alternative to Opus Clip, Eklipse and Dumme.

If we don’t support the game you are trying to process, if your video is not on one of these platforms or if you have any ideas/suggestions let us know on our Discord server or email us at community[at]framedrop[dot]co.

For more information make sure to visit framedrop.ai.
